thread.title: Casey Anthony spotted at anti-Trump protest near Mar-a-Lago
thread.title_full: Casey Anthony spotted at anti-Trump protest near Mar-a-Lago

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Casey Anthony spotted at anti-Trump protest near Mar-a-Lago
text:
44 PM 
Casey Anthony made a rare public appearance Saturday night when she attended a protest against President Trump at his Mar-a-Lago club in Palm Beach, Florida. 
The 30-year-old, who was famously acquitted in 2011 of the murder of her 2-year-old daughter Caylee, joined a 3,000-person march from Trump Plaza to the South Florida golf club, according to WPTV. 
Although Anthony wouldn’t speak on camera, she told the TV station that she disagreed with Trump’s policies. Casey Anthony was spotted at an anti-President Trump protest outside of Mar-a-Lago in Palm Beach, Florida, Saturday night. (WPTV) 
The president was in his “Winter Palace” for the weekend for several private events, including the 60th Annual Red Cross Gala and a Super Bowl party. 
Casey Anthony now living a boring 'old person’ life 
Anthony moved to South Florida after being released from jail in 2011, three years after Caylee was found dead in a trashbag in the woods near the family home. Anthony said she disagrees with the policies of Trump, who was in town for the 60th Annual Red Cross Gala. (MANDEL NGAN/AFP/Getty Images) 
She was found not guilty of first-degree murder, aggravated child abuse, and aggravated manslaughter of a child. 
In the years since being released from jail, Anthony has kept a low profile, but she has reportedly started a photography business and started dating. 
Sources told People last year that she was “bored” with her life. Join the Conversation:
